data.text: God truly is good to us Israeli people,
As for me, I almost stopped trusting in God;
because I envied those who proudly said that they did not need God,
Those people do not have any pains;
They do not have the troubles/difficulties that other people have;
So they are proud, and their being proud is like a necklace that they show to others,
From their inner beings they ◄pour out/do► evil deeds,
They scoff at other people, and they talk about doing evil things to them;
They say evil things about God who is in heaven [MTY],
The result is that people listen to what they say and praise them
Wicked people say to themselves, “God will certainly not [RHQ] know what we have done;
That is what wicked people are like;
So, God, I think it is useless that I have [RHQ] always done what you want me to,
All day long I have problems,
If I had said the things that the wicked people say,
And when I tried to think about all this,
But when I went to your temple, you spoke to me,
Now I know that you will surely put them in slippery places,
They will be destroyed instantly;
They will disappear as quickly as a dream disappears when a person awakes in the morning;
When I felt sad/bitter,
I was stupid and ignorant,
But I am always close to you,
You guide me by teaching me,
You are in heaven and I belong to you [RHQ],
My body and my mind may become very weak,
Those who remain far from you will be destroyed;
But as for me, it is wonderful to be near to God
